cmb:
MANA COST: 110/110/110/110
COOLDOWN: 30/26/22/18
desc: Causes a bladestorm of destructive force around Juggernaut, rendering him immune to magic and dealing damage to nearby enemy units.  Lasts 5 seconds.
notes:
This skill doesn't affect mechanical units.
You can use items during Blade Fury.
If a unit is not being affected by Blade Fury, Juggernaut can perform normal attacks against this unit.
Deals a total of 400/500/600/700 damage.
lore: Yurnero's renowned katana techniques are feared by warriors and sorcerors alike.
name: juggernaut_blade_fury

cmb:
MANA COST: 80/100/120/140
COOLDOWN: 60
desc: Summons a Healing Ward that heals all nearby allied units, based on their max hit points.  The Healing Ward can move at 450 movement speed after being summoned.  Lasts 25 seconds.
notes:
The healing ward can be controlled.
Multiple healing wards don't stack.
lore: Of the rituals learned at the Isle of Masks, tending wounds with a bit of voodoo magic has proven to be quite useful.
name: juggernaut_healing_ward

desc: Gives Juggernaut a chance to deal double damage on each attack.
lore: The last remnant of his heritage's commitment to bladework, Yurnero ensures that the style is remembered.
name: juggernaut_blade_dance

affects:
ABILITY: Unit Target
AFFECTS: Enemy Units
DAMAGE: Physical
attrib:
JUMPS: 3 / 6 / 9
JUMP RADIUS: 425
SCEPTER COOLDOWN: 70
SCEPTER JUMPS: 6 / 9 / 12
cmb:
MANA COST: 200/275/350
COOLDOWN: 130/120/110
desc:
Juggernaut leaps towards the target enemy unit with a damaging attack, and then slashes other nearby enemy units, dealing between 200-225 damage per slash. Juggernaut is invulnerable for the duration.
Upgradable by Aghanim's Scepter.
notes:
Interrupts channeling spells of the primary target.
Can target magic immune units.
Slashes happen on an interval of 0.4 seconds.
Creeps are killed in one hit of omnislash.
You can use items during Omnislash.
lore: 'The fruits of discipline; with practice comes strength.'
name: juggernaut_omni_slash
